.. module:: go_to_point :platform: Unix :synopsis: Implement an user interface in order to start or stop the robot .. moduleauthor:: Carmine Recchiuto , Ermanno Girardo Client:
/user_interface Implements an user interface in order to start or stop the robot. In particular it is a client that reads the user command and via custom service message Command.srv send it to the state_machine node. When the user press 1 the node sends a "start" messagge to the user_interface server. Instead if the user press 0 the node the function of go_to_point is stopped and in state_machine node the goal is cancelled, setting also the velocity to zero (to stop the robot)
